thread.title: Students on Spring Break in Mexico Upset Locals With “Build That Wall” Chant
thread.title_full: Students on Spring Break in Mexico Upset Locals With “Build That Wall” Chant

author: John Falkenberg
title: Students on Spring Break in Mexico Upset Locals With “Build That Wall” Chant
text:
ALERT: Google Makes Huge Change That Will Damage Conservatives Everywhere 
“Today I was with Suly, my wife (who is a native of Mexico ), watching an entertainment show off the coast of Cancun aboard a boat, and at the end of the show, a flock of Americans (maybe under the influence of alcohol, or maybe not), began to sing the infamous ‘Build that wall’ chant louder and louder,” he wrote. 
The editorial claimed that some people asked the chanters to stop to no avail. 
Can you believe it? People not submitting to your wishes when you ask nicely ? Almost like millions of immigrants ignoring a country’s laws and entering it and leaving it as they saw fit. Madness!   
The editorial also called the chant “Build that wall!” a racist hymn, so there’s no telling exactly how much salt we need to take this story with. 
Regardless, there is no question that liberals who hear this story will be incensed. But here’s a fact: 
They are just words. They can’t hurt you. Get over it.
